HostMayo: 1GB KVM for $3.25/mo, Shared Hosting as Cheap as $8/Year! (Los Angeles, Netherlands)

cpanel, directadmin, host mayo, hostmayo, los angeles, netherlands May 30, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

HostMayo is back!  They’re bringing us offers for KVM and shared hosting, including:

  • 1GB KVM for $3.25/month in either Los Angeles or the Netherlands
  • cPanel shared hosting for $12/year in LA, or DirectAdmin shared hosting for $8/year in the Netherlands

HostMayo gave us an offer back on October 21, 2020 and we’re glad they’ve stopped by to save our readership some money on cheap hosting.

Their WHOIS is public. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Pyapal, Credit Cards, Bitcoin, ETH, LTC, TRON etc..

Here’s a little about HostMayo in their own words:

“Host Mayo has been associated with web hosting industry since 2015. We are affordable and reliable hosting provider. Over the span of last few years we have expanded our product range to cover all hosting products ranging from simple web hosting to enterprise level VPS and dedicated servers. Host Mayo own the hardware they use and are not a reseller.”

The LEB community thrives on reports from our readers about the companies they patronize, so please comment below about your experience with HostMayo.

Now read more to see the offers!
